relatedProductQueries: SELECT ChildProduct.StockKeepingUnit FROM ProductRelatedComponent WHERE ParentProduct.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}})

preQueries.name: attributeDefinitionIds
preQueries.query: SELECT AttributeDefinitionId FROM ProductClassificationAttr WHERE ProductClassificationId IN (SELECT BasedOnId FROM Product2 WHERE StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}})) AND AttributeDefinitionId != null  GROUP BY AttributeDefinitionId

SELECT AttributeCategory.Code, CurrencyIsoCode, AttributeDefinition.Code, AttributeNameOverride, DefaultValue, Description, DisplayType, HelpText, IsHidden, IsPriceImpacting, IsReadOnly, IsRequired, MaximumCharacterCount, MaximumValue, MinimumCharacterCount, MinimumValue, Name, ProductClassification.Code, Sequence, Status, StepValue, ValueDescription FROM ProductClassificationAttr WHERE ProductClassificationId IN (SELECT BasedOnId FROM Product2 WHERE StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}}))

configurations.query: SELECT DeveloperName, IsCommercial, IsDeleted, Language, MasterLabel, ProductSpecificationType, RecordType.DeveloperName FROM ProductSpecificationRecType WHERE RecordTypeId IN (SELECT RecordTypeId FROM Product2 WHERE StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}}))

SELECT RecordType.DeveloperName, CurrencyIsoCode, UnitOfMeasure.Name, AvailabilityDate, BasedOn.Code, BillingPolicy.Name, ConfigureDuringSale, Description, DiscontinuedDate, DisplayUrl, EndOfLifeDate, ExternalId, Family, HelpText, IsActive, IsAssetizable, IsSoldOnlyWithOtherProds, Name, ProductCode, QuantityUnitOfMeasure, StockKeepingUnit, TaxPolicy.Name, Type, UsageModelType FROM Product2 WHERE StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}})

SELECT Id, Name, TYPEOF OverrideContext WHEN Product2 THEN StockKeepingUnit END, AttributeNameOverride, DefaultValue, Description, DisplayType, HelpText, IsHidden, IsPriceImpacting, IsReadOnly, IsRequired, MaximumCharacterCount, MaximumValue, MinimumCharacterCount, MinimumValue, Sequence, Status, StepValue, ValueDescription, CurrencyIsoCode, AttributeCategory.Code, AttributeDefinition.Code, ProductClassificationAttribute.AttributeCategory.Code, ProductClassificationAttribute.AttributeDefinition.Code, ProductClassificationAttribute.ProductClassification.Code,Product2.StockKeepingUnit FROM ProductAttributeDefinition WHERE Product2.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}})
SELECT Name, Parent.StockKeepingUnit, Language FROM Product2DataTranslation WHERE Parent.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}})
SELECT Name, EffectiveFrom, EffectiveTo, IsDefault FROM CostBook WHERE Id IN (SELECT CostBookId FROM CostBookEntry WHERE Product.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}}))
SELECT Cost, CostBook.Name, Product.StockKeepingUnit, CurrencyIsoCode, Description, EffectiveFrom, EffectiveTo  FROM CostBookEntry WHERE Product.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}})

SELECT CurrencyIsoCode, CostBook.Name, Description, IsActive, Name, ValidFrom, ValidTo FROM Pricebook2 WHERE Id IN (SELECT Pricebook2Id FROM PricebookEntry WHERE Product2.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}}))

SELECT ArePartialPeriodsAllowed, Name, ProrationPolicyType, RemainderStrategy FROM ProrationPolicy WHERE Id IN (SELECT ProrationPolicyId FROM ProductSellingModelOption WHERE Product2.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}}))

SELECT Name, PricingTerm, PricingTermUnit, SellingModelType, Status FROM ProductSellingModel WHERE Id IN (SELECT ProductSellingModelId FROM ProductSellingModelOption WHERE Product2.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}}))
SELECT IsDefault, Product2.StockKeepingUnit, ProductSellingModel.Name, ProrationPolicy.Name FROM ProductSellingModelOption WHERE Product2.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}})

SELECT IsActive, CurrencyIsoCode, Pricebook2.Name, Product2.StockKeepingUnit, ProductSellingModel.Name, UnitPrice, UseStandardPrice FROM PricebookEntry WHERE Product2.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}}) ORDER BY CreatedDate ASC, Pricebook2Id ASC

SELECT Name, Code, CurrencyIsoCode, CatalogType, Description, EffectiveEndDate,EffectiveStartDate FROM ProductCatalog WHERE ID IN (SELECT CatalogId FROM ProductCategory WHERE Id IN ({{productCategoryIds}})) AND Code != null

Select OverrideContext.Name, ProductRelatedComponent.ParentProduct.StockKeepingUnit, ProductRelatedComponent.ProductComponentGroup.Code, ProductRelatedComponent.ProductRelationshipType.Name,ProductRelatedComponent.ChildProductClassification.Code, ProductRelatedComponent.ChildProduct.StockKeepingUnit, ProductRelatedComponent.ChildSellingModel.Name, ProductRelatedComponent.ParentSellingModel.Name, DoesBundlePriceIncludeChild,IsComponentRequired,IsDefaultComponent,IsExcluded,IsQuantityEditable,MaxQuantity,MinQuantity,Name,Quantity FROM ProductRelComponentOverride WHERE OverrideContextId IN ({{productIds}})

SELECT CurrencyIsoCode, AdjustmentType, AdjustmentValue, EffectiveFrom, EffectiveTo, ParentProduct.StockKeepingUnit, ParentProductSellingModel.Name, PriceAdjustmentSchedule.Name, Product.StockKeepingUnit, ProductSellingModel.Name, RootBundle.StockKeepingUnit, RootProductSellingModel.Name FROM BundleBasedAdjustment WHERE ParentProduct.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}})
SELECT Name FROM AttributeBasedAdjRule WHERE Id IN (SELECT AttributeBasedAdjRuleId FROM AttributeAdjustmentCondition WHERE Product.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}})) AND Name != null

SELECT CurrencyIsoCode, AdjustmentType, AdjustmentValue, AttributeBasedAdjRule.Name, EffectiveFrom, EffectiveTo, PriceAdjustmentSchedule.Name, Product.StockKeepingUnit, ProductSellingModel.Name FROM AttributeBasedAdjustment WHERE Product.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}})

SELECT CurrencyIsoCode, FlowIdentifier, Status, IsDefault FROM ProductConfigurationFlow WHERE Id IN (SELECT ProductConfigurationFlowId FROM ProductConfigFlowAssignment WHERE Product.StockKeepingUnit IN ({{SKU}}))
